description: During [Operation Dream Job](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0022), [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) deployed malware designed not to run on computers set to Korean, Japanese, or Chinese in Windows language preferences.(Citation: ClearSky Lazarus Aug 2020)

external_references.description: ClearSky Research Team. (2020, August 13). Operation 'Dream Job' Widespread North Korean Espionage Campaign. Retrieved December 20, 2021.
